text: - [iA Writer]({{$url0}}): Best Markdown syntax editor with simplicity as its main advantage but lacks in note organization and related features.
- [Paper]({{$url0}}): Great candidate to replace iA Writer, offering an even better writing experience but has some bugs and limitations, making it suitable only for simple notes.

- [Obsidian]({{$url0}}): Used for organizing content by pasting from iA Writer or Paper. Great for content organization and can be paired with [Vitepress]({{$url1}}) to share notes online as a static website.
- [Notion]({{$url0}}): Primarily used for collaboration to create content, share it, or leverage automation. Notion offers an API for integration with services.
- [Vitepress]({{$url0}}): Paired with Obsidian to share notes online as a static website.
- [Wooting 60HE]({{$url0}}): Mechanical keyboard used for typing during writing in full-screen mode.
- [Spotify]({{$url0}}): Used for listening to music during activities.
- [Endel]({{$url0}}): Used for listening to music and focusing.
- [Xnapper]({{$url0}}): Used for taking screenshots.
- [ray.so]({{$url0}}): Used for generating code snippets via Puppeteer automation macro.
- [TinyPNG]({{$url0}}): Used for optimizing images with a macro.
- [Dropshare]({{$url0}}): Used for sharing images and files.
- [DigitalOcean]({{$url0}}): Hosting images and files.
- [Paste]({{$url0}}): Clipboard manager for easier text editing and managing copied content.
- [Linear]({{$url0}}): Used to organize work and tasks, with automation integrating via APIs and GPT-4 prompts.
- [Todoist]({{$url0}}): Preferred task management tool with API capabilities.
- [Google Workspace]({{$url0}}): Used for email management.
- [Superhuman]({{$url0}}): Email client paired with Gmail for enhanced email management.
- [Make.com]({{$url0}}): Used for email automation scenarios.
- [Zencal]({{$url0}}): Used for booking calendar slots.
- [Notion Calendar]({{$url0}}): Used as a calendar app with keyboard shortcuts and minimalist interface.
- [Arc Browser]({{$url0}}): Main browser on macOS and iOS, appreciated for Command Bar and Little Arc features.
- [Feedly]({{$url0}}): Used to stay up-to-date and monitor news with API connectivity.
- [Product Hunt]({{$url0}}): Used for exploring new topics.
- [daily.dev]({{$url0}}): Used for staying updated.
- [Indie Hackers]({{$url0}}): Used for browsing and staying informed.
- [HackerNews]({{$url0}}): Used for news and updates.
- [Figma]({{$url0}}): Used for UI design and creating advertisements with components and auto-layout feature.
- [Adobe Photoshop Beta]({{$url0}}): Returned for its Generative AI features, excellent for editing images and assets generated in Midjourney.
- [Midjourney]({{$url0}}): Used for generating graphic or asset variants.
- [Adobe Firefly]({{$url0}}): Used for slight editing of images generated in Midjourney.
- [Webflow]({{$url0}}): Used as a graphic editor in combination with [HTMLCSSToImage]({{$url1}}) for automatic generation of graphics based on templates.
- [HTMLCSSToImage]({{$url0}}): Used for automatic generation of graphics based on templates.
- [IntelliJ IDEA]({{$url0}}): Main code editor, preferred over VS Code for better code understanding, supports TypeScript and Rust.
- [Supermaven]({{$url0}}): Alternative to Github Copilot, intelligently suggests code.
- [iTerm]({{$url0}}): Preferred terminal for its simplicity.
- [TablePlus]({{$url0}}): Database client for macOS.
- [Raycast]({{$url0}}): Used for searching menu items and executing actions.
- [GitHub Actions]({{$url0}}): Used for automating code deployment.
- [Shortcuts]({{$url0}}): Used for macros and automation.
- [Keyboard Maestro]({{$url0}}): Used for macros and automation.
- [Better Touch Tool]({{$url0}}): Used for macros and automation.
- [Goodreads]({{$url0}}): Logging books read.
- [Amazon Kindle]({{$url0}}): Reading books.
- [Audible]({{$url0}}): Listening to audiobooks.
- [PlayStation 5]({{$url0}}): Gaming console.
- [Nvidia GeForce Now]({{$url0}}): Game streaming service.
- [Steam Deck]({{$url0}}): Portable gaming device.
- [Nintendo Switch]({{$url0}}): Gaming console.
